title: If only one config set is in zk and a collection node does not explicitly have a config name set on its node, use the one config set.
description: thought this was already the case but it's not - it's just if you use the boot strap collection upload property, that conf set is written to the collection node - more convient to do this as well I think

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: This is implemented in the solrcloud branch.
